In July she filed a six-page court brief- aptly titled Motion to Dismiss: The Constitutionality of "Douche Bag." Maytin contended that the disorderly conduct charge should have been dropped because Fordham was protected by free speech. She cited numerous sources to back her claim- ranging from Wikipedia to the Urban Dictionary to David Letterman .
